explanation:
Agent A is correct. MISRA C:2023 Rule 14.2 requires the third clause of a for statement to modify only the single loop counter. In the loop

for (; len >= (int)sizeof(int); ptr += sizeof(int),
                  source += sizeof(int),
                  len -= sizeof(int))

the iteration expression modifies ptr and source in addition to len. That means more than the single loop counter (len) is being modified in the third clause, which violates the rule. (Even though ptr/source are not modified inside the loop body, the rule explicitly requires the third clause to modify only the loop counter.)
